effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.

short_effect.sun-moon: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
